first things first a little bit about me

or so I work primarily in the group that
works
on things that can build revenue for

because uh it was really clear that
television was becoming a vast Wasteland
of programming um
and it was really apparent to a lot of

that there were real needs for kids to
have content
that really was appropriate to both
their developmental stage and their age
and the kinds of things that kids needed

we have these mobile platforms we are
really seriously looking at mobile as a
very important way to reach kids
wherever they
are so of course PBS is first and
foremost a broadcast organization and so

mobile

lit
and when we're developing the show we're

so just like with our shows we use our

character

developing games for kids is don't make
the wrong answer funny
than the right answer because you don't

necessarily so what the developer did

was they actually just said okay well we
don't necessarily want to make this
funny but we'll just show so if you

that goldilock slept in little Bear's
plane it'll actually change the art and
so it will be really clear to the kid

with
learning wand Red's specialty is rhyming
